bug.author: rsnk96
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: changing the label configuration does not reflect in new UI
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
When labels description is changed either using the "Constructor" or "Raw" options, the changed labels should reflect in the New UI <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Changing the label configuration in the Task details page does not reflect as a change in the labels while using the new UI. However, the changes do reflect in the old UI <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Create a test task with a set of labels Add a new label in using the constructor Check if the new label reflects in the options when drawing a shape in the New UI
<denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Git hash commit (git log -1): deac1b0 Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05):19.03.8 Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes? No Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): Linux
